LanguageData.PoisonGland.label: poison gland
LanguageData.PoisonGland.description: The gland of a dangerous poisonous animal. Dangerous. Poisonous. Don't eat this! It will kill you! \nMay be useful for making antidotes or disposing of unnecessary prisoners.
LanguageData.AntidoteSimple.label: Simple antidote
LanguageData.AntidoteSimple.description: A simple antidote for removing poison from the body and treating poisoned arrow wounds. It has side effects when taken. Consult a specialist before use.
LanguageData.AntidoteSafe.label: Safe antidote
LanguageData.AntidoteSafe.description: A safe antidote for removing poison from the body and treating poisoned wounds. Has no side effects. I promise.
